solution_line_template: Samantha, Aira, and Joe have {bands_per_person} x {number_of_people} = <<{bands_per_person}*{number_of_people}={total_bands}>>{total_bands} rubber bands altogether.
So the value of x is {numerator_for_x}/{denominator_for_x} = <<{numerator_for_x}/{denominator_for_x}={aira_bands}>>{aira_bands}. Hence, Aira had {aira_bands} rubber bands.
